definitions.definition: A number of domestic animals assembled together under the watch or ownership of a keeper. [from 11th c.]
Any collection of animals gathered or travelling in a company. [from 13th c.]
( now usually derogatory ) A crowd , a mass of people or things; a rabble . [from 15th c.]

main_definition: A number of domestic animals assembled together under the watch or ownership of a keeper. [from 11th c.]
secondary_definitions: Any collection of animals gathered or travelling in a company. [from 13th c.]
( now usually derogatory ) A crowd , a mass of people or things; a rabble . [from 15th c.]

definitions.definition: Someone who keeps a group of domestic animals.

main_definition: ( now rare ) Someone who keeps a group of domestic animals.
